languages.text: "Можно было бы. Но я совершенно точно не собираюсь этого делать", {n}— скучно, буднично говорит Владайм.{/n} "Не стал бы даже в обычной ситуации. А уж когда над станцией висит угроза голода, и перспективы весьма туманны..."

"I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."
languages.original_text: "Можно было бы. Но я совершенно точно не собираюсь этого делать", {n}— скучно, буднично говорит Владайм.{/n} "Не стал бы даже в обычной ситуации. А уж когда над станцией висит угроза голода, и перспективы весьма туманны..."

traits.locale_text: "I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

"I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

"I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

"I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

"I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

languages.text: 「そうすることもできる。でも、それは絶対に起こり得ない」{n}ヴラダイムは何でもない軽い口調で言う。{/n}「普通の状況下でもそんなことはしない。それに、ステーションには飢餓の脅威が迫っていて、先行きは全く見えないのだから…」
languages.original_text: "I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

traits.locale_text: 「そうすることもできる。でも、それは絶対に起こり得ない」{n}ヴラダイムは何でもない軽い口調で言う。{/n}「普通の状況下でもそんなことはしない。それに、ステーションには飢餓の脅威が迫っていて、先行きは全く見えないのだから…」

languages.text: “我确实可以，但我不打算这么做。”{n}弗拉迪姆以漫不经心的无聊预期开了口。{/n}“哪怕一切正常，我也不打算这么做。至于现在，这座星站正面临着饥荒的威胁，我们的前景又如此不明朗，您看……”
languages.original_text: "I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

traits.locale_text: “我确实可以，但我不打算这么做。”{n}弗拉迪姆以漫不经心的无聊预期开了口。{/n}“哪怕一切正常，我也不打算这么做。至于现在，这座星站正面临着饥荒的威胁，我们的前景又如此不明朗，您看……”

languages.text: «Podría haberlo hecho, pero ni se me pasa por la cabeza»{n}, dice Vladaym en tono aburrido y despreocupado.{/n} «No lo haría ni siquiera en circunstancias normales. Y con la hambruna acechando la estación y nuestro pronóstico siendo tan incierto, bueno...».
languages.original_text: "I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

traits.locale_text: «Podría haberlo hecho, pero ni se me pasa por la cabeza»{n}, dice Vladaym en tono aburrido y despreocupado.{/n} «No lo haría ni siquiera en circunstancias normales. Y con la hambruna acechando la estación y nuestro pronóstico siendo tan incierto, bueno...».

languages.text: « J'aurais pu, mais je ne compte pas le faire, {n}répond-il d'un ton ennuyé et désinvolte.{/n} Je ne le ferais déjà pas si la situation était normale, et entre la menace d'une famine qui pèse sur la station et notre avenir incertain, ma foi... »
languages.original_text: "I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

traits.locale_text: « J'aurais pu, mais je ne compte pas le faire, {n}répond-il d'un ton ennuyé et désinvolte.{/n} Je ne le ferais déjà pas si la situation était normale, et entre la menace d'une famine qui pèse sur la station et notre avenir incertain, ma foi... »

languages.text: "Das hätte ich. Aber ich werde es definitiv nicht tun", {n}sagt Vladaym gelangweilt und gleichgültig.{/n} "Nicht einmal unter normalen Umständen. Aber mit der Bedrohung einer Hungersnot und derart unsicheren Zukunftsaussichten ..."
languages.original_text: "I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

traits.locale_text: "Das hätte ich. Aber ich werde es definitiv nicht tun", {n}sagt Vladaym gelangweilt und gleichgültig.{/n} "Nicht einmal unter normalen Umständen. Aber mit der Bedrohung einer Hungersnot und derart unsicheren Zukunftsaussichten ..."

languages.text: "Edebilirdim ama katiyetle etmeyeceğim." {n}diyor Vladaym, sıkılmış ve umursamaz bir sesle.{/n} "Normal şartlar altında dahi etmezdim. Hele ki istasyonu bekleyen bir kıtlık tehdidi varken ve istikbalimiz belirsizliğini korurken..."
languages.original_text: "I could have. But I'm certainly not going to," {n}Vladaym says in a bored and casual tone.{/n} "I wouldn't even under normal circumstances. And with the threat of famine hanging over the station and our prospects so unclear, well..."

traits.locale_text: "Edebilirdim ama zahir etmeyeceğim." {n}diyor Vladaym sıkılmış ve umursamaz bir sesle.{/n} "Normal şartlar altında dahi etmezdim ki istasyonu bekleyen kıtlık tehdidi ve manzaranın belirsizliği göz önüne alınırsa..."
